item.title: City council member faces additional charges in absentee ballot investigation

item.title: Bones found in search for father accused of killing 3 daughters
item.description: The FBI said it found bones while searching for signs of Travis Decker. The bones were being analyzed to determine if they are human or animal.

item.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that most of President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs are unlawful.
